title: INVESTORS HERITAGE CAPITAL CORPORATION SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Rigrodsky & Long, P.A. Investigation of Buyout
text:
WILMINGTON, Del.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Rigrodsky & Long, P.A.:
Do you own shares of Investors Heritage Capital Corporation (OTC QB: IHRC )? Did you purchase any of your shares prior to October 27, 2017? Do you think the proposed buyout is fair? Do you want to discuss your rights?
Rigrodsky & Long, P.A. announces that it is investigating potential legal claims against the board of directors of Investors Heritage Capital Corporation (“IHCC” or the “Company”) (OTC QB: IHRC ) regarding possible breaches of fiduciary duties and other violations of law related to the Company’s entry into an agreement to be acquired by Aquarian Investors Heritage Holdings LLC (“Aquarian”) in a transaction valued at approximately $60.5 million. Under the terms of the agreement, shareholders of IHCC will receive $44.75 in cash for each share of IHCC common stock.
If you own common stock of IHCC and purchased any shares before October 27, 2017, if you would like to learn more about this investigation, or if you have any questions concerning this announcement or your rights or interests, please contact Seth D. Rigrodsky or Gina M. Serra at Rigrodsky & Long, P.A., 300 Delaware Avenue, Suite 1220, Wilmington, Delaware 19801, by telephone at (888) 969-4242, or by e-mail at info@rl-legal.com .
Rigrodsky & Long, P.A. , with offices in Wilmington, Delaware and Garden City, New York, regularly prosecutes securities fraud, shareholder corporate, and shareholder derivative litigation on behalf of shareholders in state and federal courts throughout the United States.
